content.rendered:
Ashley joins the Luxe team from across the pond. Having worked in New Zealand’s biggest hair salon group, Ashley has an excellent pedigree in providing an exceptional standard of hairdressing and client servicing.

Now living in Sydney, Ashley is building long term relationships with the Luxe clients, and her keen eye for detail and modern colouring style has won many fans. Ashley has a young, fun attitude which she brings to her hairdressing style. We are sure you will love her.

Availability: Wednesday & Saturday.

excerpt.rendered: Ashley has a youthful and fun attitude to hairdressing, with a keen eye for detail and colouring.
